00032 // Create the global collection of stop watches
00033 Mesquite::StopWatchCollection Mesquite::GlobalStopWatches;
00034 
00035 #ifdef HAVE_TIMES
00036 #  include <sys/times.h>
00037 #  include <unistd.h>
00038 #  include <limits.h>
00039 #  ifndef CLK_TCK
00040 #    ifdef _SC_CLK_TCK
00041 #      define CLK_TCK sysconf(_SC_CLK_TCK)
00042 #    else
00043 #      include <sys/param.h>
00044 #      ifdef HZ
00045 #        define CLK_TCK HZ
00046 #      else
00047 #        error times(3) w/out CLK_TCK.  Please report this.
00048 #        undef HAVE_TIMES
00049 #      endif
00050 #    endif
00051 #  endif
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #ifdef HAVE_TIMES
00055    static inline double now()
00056    {
00057      tms t;
00058      times( &t );
00059      return (double)(t.tms_utime + t.tms_stime) / CLK_TCK;
00060    }
00061 #elif defined(HAVE_CLOCK)
00062 #  include <ctime>
00063    static inline double now()
00064    {
00065      return (double)std::clock() / CLOCKS_PER_SEC; 
00066    }
00067 #endif

00070 
00071 Mesquite::Timer::Timer() 
00072     : atBirth(now())
00073 {
00074   atLastCheck = atBirth;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void Mesquite::Timer::reset()
00078 {
00079   atBirth=now();
00080   atLastCheck = atBirth;
00081 }
00082 
00083 double Mesquite::Timer::since_last_check()
00084 {
00085   double right_now = now();
00086   double rv = right_now - atLastCheck;
00087   atLastCheck = right_now;
00088   return rv;
00089 }
00090 
00091 double Mesquite::Timer::since_birth() const
00092 {
00093   return now() - atBirth;
00094 }
00095 
00096 void Mesquite::StopWatch::start()
00097 {
00098   if (!isRunning)
00099   {
00100     isRunning = true;
00101     timeAtLastStart=now();
00102     ++numStarts;
00103   }
00104 }
00105 
00106 void Mesquite::StopWatch::stop()
00107 {
00108   if (isRunning)
00109   {
00110     isRunning = false;
00111     totalTime += now() - timeAtLastStart;
00112   }
00113 }
00114 
00115 void Mesquite::StopWatch::reset()
00116 {
00117   isRunning=false;
00118   totalTime=0;
00119   numStarts=0;
00120 }
00121 
00122 double Mesquite::StopWatch::total_time() const
00123 {
00124   double rv = totalTime;
00125   if (isRunning)
00126     rv += now() - timeAtLastStart;
00127   return rv;
00128 }
00129 
00130 Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::Key Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::add(
00131   const std::string &name,
00132   bool fail_if_exists)
00133 {
00134     // Don't allow empty name
00135   if (name == "")
00136     return 0;
00137   
00138   Key key = get_key(name);
00139   
00140     // If the named stopwatch doesn't exist...
00141   if (!key)
00142   {
00143       // See if there is an unused existing stopwatch
00144     size_t i;
00145     for (i = 0; i < mEntries.size(); i++)
00146     {
00147       if (mEntries[i].first == "")
00148       {
00149         mEntries[i].first = name;
00150         mEntries[i].second.reset();
00151         break;
00152       }
00153     }
00154       // If not, create a new one
00155     if (i == mEntries.size())
00156     {
00157       mEntries.push_back(std::pair<std::string, StopWatch>(name, StopWatch()));
00158     }
00159     key = i+1;
00160   }
00161     // If it already existed...
00162   else if (fail_if_exists)
00163     key = 0;
00164   
00165   return key;
00166 }
00167 
00168 
00169 Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::Key Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::get_key(
00170   const std::string &name) const
00171 {
00172   Key key = 0;
00173   
00174   for (size_t i = 0; i < mEntries.size(); i++)
00175   {
00176     if (mEntries[i].first == name)
00177     {
00178       key = i + 1;
00179       break;
00180     }
00181   }
00182 
00183   return key;
00184 }
00185 
00186 void Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::remove(
00187   const Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::Key key)
00188 {
00189     // Get rid of anything at the end of the list
00190   if (key == mEntries.size())
00191   {
00192     mEntries.pop_back();
00193     while (!mEntries.empty() && mEntries.back().first == "")
00194     {
00195       mEntries.pop_back();
00196     }
00197   }
00198   
00199   else if (key > 0 && key < mEntries.size())
00200   {
00201       // If in the middle of the list, set its name to ""
00202     mEntries[key-1].first = "";
00203   }
00204 }
00205 
00206 
00207 void Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::start(
00208   const Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::Key key)
00209 {
00210   if (key > 0 &&
00211       key <= mEntries.size() &&
00212       mEntries[key-1].first != "")
00213     mEntries[key-1].second.start();
00214 }
00215 
00216 void Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::stop(
00217   const Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::Key key)
00218 {
00219   if (key > 0 &&
00220       key <= mEntries.size() &&
00221       mEntries[key-1].first != "")
00222     mEntries[key-1].second.stop();
00223 }
00224 
00225 void Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::reset(
00226   const Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::Key key)
00227 {
00228   if (key > 0 &&
00229       key <= mEntries.size())
00230     mEntries[key-1].second.reset();
00231 }
00232 
00233 
00234 double Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::total_time(
00235   const Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::Key key) const
00236 {
00237   if (key > 0 &&
00238       key <= mEntries.size() &&
00239       mEntries[key-1].first != "")
00240     return mEntries[key-1].second.total_time();
00241   else
00242     return 0.0;
00243 }
00244 
00245 int Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::number_of_starts(
00246   const Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::Key key) const
00247 {
00248   if (key > 0 &&
00249       key <= mEntries.size() &&
00250       mEntries[key-1].first != "")
00251     return mEntries[key-1].second.number_of_starts();
00252   else
00253     return 0;
00254 }
00260 void Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::get_keys_sorted_by_time(
00261   std::vector<Key> &sorted_keys)
00262 {
00263   int num_watches=mEntries.size();
00264   int *sorted_indices=new int[num_watches];
00265   int i=0;
00266   int counter=0;
00267   for(i=0;i<num_watches;++i){
00268     sorted_indices[i]=0;
00269   }
00270   double current_max;
00271   int index_to_max;
00272     //While we haven't added all of the Keys to the vector
00273   while(counter<num_watches){
00274     current_max=-1;
00275     index_to_max=-1;
00276       //loop over the times and find the largest remaining
00277     for(i=0;i<num_watches;++i){
00278       if(mEntries[i].second.total_time()>current_max && sorted_indices[i]==0){
00279         current_max=mEntries[i].second.total_time();
00280         index_to_max=i;
00281       }
00282     }
00283       //Add the key associated with index_to_max and any subsequent
00284       //keys which are associated with a StopWatch that has a total
00285       //time equal to current_max;
00286     for(i=index_to_max;i<num_watches;++i){
00287       if(mEntries[i].second.total_time()>=current_max && sorted_indices[i]==0)
00288       {
00289         counter++;
00290         sorted_indices[i]=counter;
00291         sorted_keys.push_back(i+1);
00292       }
00293     }
00294   }
00295     //clean up
00296   delete[] sorted_indices;
00297 }
00298 
00299 // Originally in MsqMessage.cpp
00300 // Moved here and converted to an ostream operator 
00301 // by J.Kraftcheck, 2004-10-18
00302 std::ostream& Mesquite::operator<<( std::ostream& str,
00303                                           Mesquite::StopWatchCollection& coll )
00304 {
00305   std::vector<Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::Key> sorted_keys;
00306   Mesquite::GlobalStopWatches.get_keys_sorted_by_time(sorted_keys);
00307   int number_of_keys=sorted_keys.size();
00308   int i =0;
00309   str<<"\nTIME        | NUM. STARTS | TIMER NAME ("<<number_of_keys<<" timers)\n";
00310   for(i=0;i<number_of_keys;++i){
00311           str<<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)
00312              <<std::setw(13)
00313              <<Mesquite::GlobalStopWatches.total_time(sorted_keys[i])
00314              <<" "
00315              <<std::setw(13)
00316              <<Mesquite::GlobalStopWatches.number_of_starts(sorted_keys[i])
00317              <<" "
00318              <<Mesquite::GlobalStopWatches.get_string(sorted_keys[i])
00319              <<std::endl;
00320   }
00321   return str;
00322 }
